title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons           OAK RIDGE, TENNESSEE     AMERICAN MUSEUM OF SCIENCE & ENERGY   Address  300 S. Tulane Avenue Oak Ridge, TN 37830   Phone (865) 576-6767    Hours   Monday through Saturday 9:00-5:00 pm Sunday 1:00-5:00 pm  More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.          LOS ALAMOS, NEW MEXICO     LOS ALAMOS VISITOR CONTACT STATION   Address  475 20th Street Los Alamos, NM 87544   Phone (505) 661-6277   Hours Winter Hours (Oct. 16 to April 30):    10:00–4:00 on weekdays  11:00–4:00 on weekends    Summer Hours (May 1 to Oct. 15):    9:30–4:30 on weekdays 11:00–4:00 on weekends    More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Los Alamos, New Mexico.          HANFORD, WASHINGTON        B-REACTOR MUSEUM & VISITOR CONTACT STATION Address 2000 Logston Blvd  Richland, WA 99354    Phone (509) 376-1647   Hours  Summer Hours (April through November)    7:00-4:00 Monday through Saturday  Closed Sunday    Winter Hours (December through March)    8:00-4:00 Monday through Thursday  Closed Friday through Sunday    More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Hanford, Washington.
